name: SpacePirate
description: the gameplay is simple shoot the enemies and DONT let them hit your mothership. its a shootergame which gets harder the more enemies you kill. for each kill you get gold and the more gold you have the more the enemies want to kill you and the faster they get. thats why when theyre too fast you can store your gold in the mothership which appears every 15 seconds. lets turn the engines on and lift the anker and make as much gold as possible. YARR KILL THOSE SPACE PIRATES AND PLUNDER ALL THAT GOLD
